google_google_project_service.description: Allows management of a single API service for a Google Cloud Platform project.

project.description: The project ID. If not provided, the provider project is used.

disable_dependent_services.description: If `true`, services that are enabled and which depend on this service should also be disabled when this service is destroyed.

disable_on_destroy.description: If true, disable the service when the terraform resource is destroyed.  Defaults to true.  May be useful in the event that a project is long-lived but the infrastructure running in that project changes frequently.
